td.content: s:M aged 25 years presents with chronic moderate cloudiness in eyes. he reports having no more than one drink a day he does not smoke o:Height 74 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate cloudiness in eyes for 4 weeks. pt is a 25 year old male. o:Height 74 in, Weight 170 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered phacoemulsification (phaco) - eye.

s:a white male aged 25 yrs presents with moderate cloudiness in eyes. he drinks alcohol occasionally Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 73 in, Weight 168 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:a male weatherman aged 25 yrs says he is having symptoms of moderate cloudiness in eyes 3 x week, mostly during the day. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month denies any smoking o:Height 74 in, Weight 170 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered non-dilated fundus examination.
